content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help clarify the swimming drills and interval training for you. Remember to start slowly and gradually increase the intensity and difficulty of your workouts as you become more comfortable with the drills and intervals.

It's great that you're focusing on proper body position, engaging your core, and using the drills to improve your swimming efficiency and speed. These are all key elements to becoming a stronger and more efficient swimmer.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further clarification on any of the drills or intervals. And most importantly, have fun and enjoy the process of improving your swimming skills!

Now, go crush your swim sessions and get ready to tackle that triathlon!
